message.name: ERR_ONLY_ONE_THIRD_PARTY_CAN_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Only one Third Party can be entered. Please search for a registered Third Party or enter details for an unregistered Third Party.

message.name: ERR_FOR_UNREGISTERED_THIRD_PARTY_NAME_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: The Third Party Name must be entered if any of the Third Party details are entered.

message.name: ERR_FOR_UNREGISTERED_THIRD_PARTY_ADDRESS_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: If unregistered Third Party name is entered, then Third Party's address must be entered.

message.name: ERR_THIRD_PARTY_CANNOT_BE_APPELLANT
message.locale: The Third Party cannot be the Appellant on the Case.

message.name: ERR_THIRD_PARTY_CANNOT_BE_RESPONDENT
message.locale: The Third Party cannot be the Respondent on the Case.

message.name: ERR_THIRD_PARTY_ALREADY_REMOVED
message.locale: The Third Party has already been canceled.
The Third Party has already been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_CASE_CLOSED_THIRD_PARTY_CANNOT_BE_REMOVED
message.locale: The Appeal case is closed. The Third Party cannot be removed from the appeal Case.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_CASE_CANCELLED_THIRD_PARTY_CANNOT_BE_REMOVED
message.locale: The Appeal case is canceled. The Third Party cannot be removed from the appeal Case.
The Appeal case is cancelled. The Third Party cannot be removed from the appeal Case.
